verses.verse: וַיֹּ֨סֶף <S%H3254><s%> add ע֥וֹד <S%H5750><s%> again דָּוִ֛ד <S%H1732><s%> Again David אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בָּח֥וּר <S%H970><s%> young בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> [men] of Israel שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <S%H7970><s%> thirty אָֽלֶף׃ <S%H505><s%> thousand

וַיָּ֣קָם ׀ <S%H6965><s%> arose וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> and went דָּוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> And David וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> with all the people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who אִתּ֔וֹ <S%H854><s%> for מִֽבַּעֲלֵ֖י יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H1184><s%> that [were] with him from Baale of Judah לְהַעֲל֣וֹת <S%H5927><s%> to bring up מִשָּׁ֗ם <S%H8033><s%> there אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> אֲר֣וֹן <S%H727><s%> from thence the ark הָאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> of God אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which נִקְרָ֣א <S%H7121><s%> is called שֵׁ֗ם <S%H8034><s%> whose name שֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> by the name יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD צְבָא֛וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts יֹשֵׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> that dwelleth הַכְּרֻבִ֖ים <S%H3742><s%> [between] the cherubims עָלָֽיו׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

וַיַּרְכִּ֜בוּ <S%H7392><s%> And they set אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲר֤וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark הָֽאֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> of God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about עֲגָלָ֣ה <S%H5699><s%> cart חֲדָשָׁ֔ה <S%H2319><s%> upon a new וַיִּשָּׂאֻ֔הוּ <S%H5375><s%> and brought מִבֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> it out of the house אֲבִינָדָ֖ב <S%H41><s%> of Abinadab אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which בַּגִּבְעָ֑ה <S%H1389><s%> the hill וְעֻזָּ֣א <S%H5798><s%> and Uzzah וְאַחְי֗וֹ <S%H283><s%> and Ahio בְּנֵי֙ <S%H1121><s%> the sons אֲבִ֣ינָדָ֔ב <S%H41><s%> of Abinadab נֹהֲגִ֖ים <S%H5090><s%> drave אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעֲגָלָ֥ה <S%H5699><s%> cart חֲדָשָֽׁה׃ <S%H2319><s%> the new

וַיִּשָּׂאֻ֗הוּ <S%H5375><s%> And they brought מִבֵּ֤ית <S%H1004><s%> it out of the house אֲבִֽינָדָב֙ <S%H41><s%> of Abinadab אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which בַּגִּבְעָ֔ה <S%H1389><s%> the hill עִ֖ם <S%H5973><s%> accompanying אֲר֣וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> of God וְאַחְי֕וֹ <S%H283><s%> and Ahio הֹלֵ֖ךְ <S%H1980><s%> went לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before הָאָרֽוֹן׃ <S%H727><s%> the ark

וְדָוִ֣ד ׀ <S%H1732><s%> And David וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> and all the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מְשַֽׂחֲקִים֙ <S%H7832><s%> played לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD בְּכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all עֲצֵ֣י <S%H6086><s%> wood בְרוֹשִׁ֑ים <S%H1265><s%> on all manner of [instruments made of] fir וּבְכִנֹּר֤וֹת <S%H3658><s%> even on harps וּבִנְבָלִים֙ <S%H5035><s%> and on psalteries וּבְתֻפִּ֔ים <S%H8596><s%> and on timbrels וּבִמְנַֽעַנְעִ֖ים <S%H4517><s%> and on cornets וּֽבְצֶלְצֶלִֽים׃ <S%H6767><s%> and on cymbals

וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> And when they came עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against גֹּ֣רֶן <S%H1637><s%> threshingfloor נָכ֑וֹן <S%H5225><s%> to Nachon's וַיִּשְׁלַ֨ח <S%H7971><s%> put forth עֻזָּ֜א <S%H5798><s%> Uzzah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> toward אֲר֤וֹן <S%H727><s%> [his hand] to the ark הָֽאֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> of God וַיֹּ֣אחֶז <S%H270><s%> and took hold בּ֔וֹ כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> nearly שָׁמְט֖וּ <S%H8058><s%> shook הַבָּקָֽר׃ <S%H1241><s%> of it for the oxen

וַיִּֽחַר־ <S%H2734><s%> was kindled אַ֤ף <S%H639><s%> And the anger יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בְּעֻזָּ֔ה <S%H5798><s%> against Uzzah וַיַּכֵּ֥הוּ <S%H5221><s%> smote שָׁ֛ם <S%H8033><s%> there הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> and God עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> for הַשַּׁ֑ל <S%H7944><s%> him there for [his] error וַיָּ֣מָת <S%H4191><s%> and there he died שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> there עִ֖ם <S%H5973><s%> by אֲר֥וֹן <S%H727><s%> by the ark הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> of God

וַיִּ֣חַר <S%H2734><s%> was displeased לְדָוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> And David עַל֩ <S%H5921><s%> and אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after פָּרַ֧ץ <S%H6555><s%> had made יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> because the LORD פֶּ֖רֶץ <S%H6556><s%> a breach בְּעֻזָּ֑ה <S%H5798><s%> upon Uzzah וַיִּקְרָ֞א <S%H7121><s%> and he called לַמָּק֤וֹם <S%H4725><s%> the name of the place הַהוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he פֶּ֣רֶץ עֻזָּ֔ה <S%H6560><s%> Perezuzzah עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> against הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> to this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> to this

וַיִּרָ֥א <S%H3372><s%> was afraid דָוִ֛ד <S%H1732><s%> And David אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> that day הַה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> and he וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said אֵ֛יךְ <S%H349><s%> How יָב֥וֹא <S%H935><s%> come אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> can אֲר֥וֹן <S%H727><s%> How shall the ark יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not אָבָ֣ה <S%H14><s%> would דָוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> So David לְהָסִ֥יר <S%H5493><s%> not remove אֵלָ֛יו <S%H413><s%> about אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲר֥וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> into עִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> unto him into the city דָּוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> of David וַיַּטֵּ֣הוּ <S%H5186><s%> carried it aside דָוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> but David בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> into the house עֹבֵֽד־ אֱד֖וֹם <S%H5654><s%> of Obededom הַגִּתִּֽי׃ <S%H1663><s%> the Gittite

וַיֵּשֶׁב֩ <S%H3427><s%> continued אֲר֨וֹן <S%H727><s%> And the ark יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> in the house עֹבֵ֥ד אֱדֹ֛ם <S%H5654><s%> of Obededom הַגִּתִּ֖י <S%H1663><s%> the Gittite שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <S%H7969><s%> three חֳדָשִׁ֑ים <S%H2320><s%> months וַיְבָ֧רֶךְ <S%H1288><s%> blessed יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֹבֵ֥ד אֱדֹ֖ם <S%H5654><s%> Obededom וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all בֵּיתֽוֹ׃ <S%H1004><s%> and all his household

וַיֻּגַּ֗ד <S%H5046><s%> And it was told לַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king דָּוִד֮ <S%H1732><s%> David לֵאמֹר֒ <S%H559><s%> saying בֵּרַ֣ךְ <S%H1288><s%> hath blessed יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֨ית <S%H1004><s%> the house עֹבֵ֤ד אֱדֹם֙ <S%H5654><s%> of Obededom וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after ל֔וֹ בַּעֲב֖וּר <S%H5668><s%> account אֲר֣וֹן <S%H727><s%> and all that [pertaineth] unto him because of the ark הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> of God וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went דָּוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> So David וַיַּעַל֩ <S%H5927><s%> and brought up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲר֨וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark הָאֱלֹהִ֜ים <S%H430><s%> of God מִבֵּ֨ית <S%H1004><s%> from the house עֹבֵ֥ד אֱדֹ֛ם <S%H5654><s%> of Obededom עִ֥יר <S%H5892><s%> into the city דָּוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> of David בְּשִׂמְחָֽה׃ <S%H8057><s%> with gladness

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> become כִּ֧י <S%H3588><s%> when צָעֲד֛וּ <S%H6805><s%> had gone נֹשְׂאֵ֥י <S%H5375><s%> And it was [so] that when they that bare אֲרוֹן־ <S%H727><s%> the ark יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD שִׁשָּׁ֣ה <S%H8337><s%> six צְעָדִ֑ים <S%H6806><s%> paces וַיִּזְבַּ֥ח <S%H2076><s%> he sacrificed שׁ֖וֹר <S%H7794><s%> oxen וּמְרִֽיא׃ <S%H4806><s%> and fatlings

וְדָוִ֛ד <S%H1732><s%> And David מְכַרְכֵּ֥ר <S%H3769><s%> danced בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֹ֖ז <S%H5797><s%> with all [his] might לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְדָוִ֕ד <S%H1732><s%> and David חָג֖וּר <S%H2296><s%> [was] girded אֵפ֥וֹד <S%H646><s%> ephod בָּֽד׃ <S%H906><s%> with a linen

וְדָוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> So David וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> and all the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מַעֲלִ֖ים <S%H5927><s%> brought up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲר֣וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בִּתְרוּעָ֖ה <S%H8643><s%> with shouting וּבְק֥וֹל <S%H6963><s%> and with the sound שׁוֹפָֽר׃ <S%H7782><s%> of the trumpet

וְהָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> happened אֲר֣וֹן <S%H727><s%> And as the ark יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בָּ֖א <S%H935><s%> came עִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> into the city דָּוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> of David וּמִיכַ֨ל <S%H4324><s%> Michal בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> daughter שָׁא֜וּל <S%H7586><s%> Saul's נִשְׁקְפָ֣ה ׀ <S%H8259><s%> looked בְּעַ֣ד <S%H1157><s%> out הַחַלּ֗וֹן <S%H2474><s%> through a window וַתֵּ֨רֶא <S%H7200><s%> and saw אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמֶּ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king דָּוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> David מְפַזֵּ֤ז <S%H6339><s%> leaping וּמְכַרְכֵּר֙ <S%H3769><s%> and dancing לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וַתִּ֥בֶז <S%H959><s%> and she despised ל֖וֹ בְּלִבָּֽהּ׃ <S%H3820><s%> him in her heart

וַיָּבִ֜אוּ <S%H935><s%> And they brought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲר֣וֹן <S%H727><s%> in the ark יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַיַּצִּ֤גוּ <S%H3322><s%> and set אֹתוֹ֙ <S%H853><s%> בִּמְקוֹמ֔וֹ <S%H4725><s%> it in his place בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> in the midst הָאֹ֔הֶל <S%H168><s%> of the tabernacle אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which נָטָה־ <S%H5186><s%> had pitched ל֖וֹ דָּוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> that David וַיַּ֨עַל <S%H5927><s%> offered דָּוִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> for it and David עֹל֛וֹת <S%H5930><s%> burnt offerings לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וּשְׁלָמִֽים׃ <S%H8002><s%> and peace offerings

וַיְכַ֣ל <S%H3615><s%> had made an end דָּוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> And as soon as David מֵהַעֲל֥וֹת <S%H5927><s%> of offering הָעוֹלָ֖ה <S%H5930><s%> burnt offerings וְהַשְּׁלָמִ֑ים <S%H8002><s%> and peace offerings וַיְבָ֣רֶךְ <S%H1288><s%> he blessed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> the people בְּשֵׁ֖ם <S%H8034><s%> in the name יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <S%H6635><s%> of hosts
